StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetLeadsByRecruiter]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @RecruiterID uniqueiden..er ) AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT [Lead].[LeadID], [RecruitID], [DateStartedWorking], [PayGradeID], [DOR], [PrimaryMOSID], [AddtlMOSID1], [AddtlMOSID2], [PresentRUCID], [DateRECC], [DateEndAc.veService], [MCC], [ReserveRUCID], [MaritalStatusID], [NumberDependents], [CompositeScore], [DrawCaseCode], [ConductAvgService], [Pro.ciencyAvgService], [ReEnlistmentCode], [DateCRCRCer..ca.on], [SatYears], [DateEnteredArmedForces], [DatePayEntryBase], [DateArmedForcesAc.veDutyBase], [DateHIVScreen], [DateMostCurrentPHA], [DateMostCurrentPhysical], [Separa.onCode], [DateProjectedJoin], [NWARequestTypeID], [MarkedUnworkable_UserID], [MarkedUnworkable_Date], [Veri.edUnworkable_UserID], [Veri.edUnworkable_Date], [NWARequested_UserID], [NWARequested_Date], [NWAApproved_UserID], [NWAApproved_Date], [AssignedRecruiterID], [DateAssigned], [Gender], [PrimaryPhone], [SecondaryPhone], [Ter.aryPhone], [NOK1], [NOK2], [AtachedPSRSSID], [ComponentCode], [ReserveComponentCode], [ErroneousJoin], [TotalRe.rementPoints] FROM [dbo].[Lead], [dbo].[LeadPhones] WHERE [dbo].[Lead].[AssignedRecruiterID] = @RecruiterID AND [dbo].[LeadPhones].[LeadID] = [dbo].[Lead].[LeadID]
